Question: Dong Guan Vdette Information Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan VDETTE Information Technology Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Low-temperature plasma technology air sterilizer
- Functions include anti-virus and sterilization, anti-sensitivity, odor elimination, and food preservation
- Products have independent intellectual property rights and third-party testing
- Exported to Japan, Philippines, Russia, Taiwan, and other countries
- Products include car, household, and wearable air sterilizers
- Certified with CE, FCC, RoHS, and H1N1 test reports
- No consumables required, economical and convenient

Address:
A503 Guanghui Building, Shangkeng Street, Changping Town, Dongguan City, Guangdong Province, China
Email: info@vdette.com
Website: www.vdette.com
Summary_cn:
东莞市VDETTE信息技术有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点

- 低温等离子技术空气消毒器
- 功能包括防病毒和消毒、抗敏感、消除异味和食品保鲜
- 产品拥有独立的知识产权和第三方测试
- 出口至日本、菲律宾、俄罗斯、台湾等国家
- 产品包括车载、家用和可穿戴空气消毒器
- 获得CE、FCC、RoHS和H1N1测试报告认证
- 无需消耗品，经济实用

地址：
中国广东省东莞市长平镇上坑街光辉大厦A503室
